background.title: Background
background.description1: I'm a Financial Software Associate at Galatea Associates LLC, where I help solve Wall Street's most challenging problems through custom software solutions. Working with investment banks and financial institutions, I deliver technology that transforms complex workflows into streamlined, efficient systems.
background.description2: Since 2018, I've been tackling technology problems professionally, building my expertise across the full development stack. My approach combines technical excellence with creative problem-solving to deliver robust solutions that address real business needs.
